main.name: Anthony Christopher
main.description: Determined and hardworking, I find pleasure in the proccess and being the best I can be.
main.bio:
Determined and hardworking, I find pleasure in the proccess and being the best I can be. Im skilled in FullStack development with great versatility and expertise in several scopes, such as web development, teaching, entrepeuneurship,marketing and customer services.
I take pride in my communication skills and how it aids me and others in the workplace. I am always ready to learn something new and willing to respond to adversities even under a lot of pressure. Leadership is key, always trying to deliver the best, and encourage everyone to do the same.
 Through football at the collegiate and highschool level I've developed a sensation for leadership and perservearing, I am a first team all conference athlete and take alot of proud in hard work.

resume.skillmessage: Here are a few of my skills

education.degree: Degree in Computer Science and Business

work.title: Fullstack Developer/Project Management Intern
work.description: Did fullstack development, worked with several big name companies such as Nike,Coke and Gatorade. Mainly focused on creating web components in nuxt/vue. Created several pages and also learned how to manuveur through a normal work day as a project manager.

work.title: Software Engineering Intern
work.description: Working in a team of 5 to help ship the version 2 program of the drip7 web application.

work.title: Tech
work.description: At Target in north Spokane, my responsibilities included cell activation, 5am truck unloads, customer service/casheering and also working with online orders. I learned alot about business operation and customer service

work.title: Application/Web Developer
work.description: Working for a client on a website, I use many different tools such as REACT,NODE,DJANGO and other front/back end developer tools.

work.title: Grader
work.description: In charge of a group of 1 CS2 class and their grades on projects/homeworks

work.title: General Sales
work.description: Did alot of drive through and customer service related responsibilities, also worked with spreadsheets and helped count cashier tills at end of the night. I learned alot about opening and closing as well as customer service
